concept.title: Student Personal Information and Privacy
concept.shortdesc: You can use your NC State Unity account to access your personal, academic and financial information, and it's very important that you keep this information safe. Use the resources and information below to protect your privacy

section.title: Personal Information Tile
section.p: On the Personal Information tile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information.

ul.li: Personal Details (Student ID number, Name and Preferred Name)
Veterans Information (Military Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests)
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)
